Name: dataset_name
Comment: dataset name, dataset should be unique under same data source. On dataset can have multiple files

Name: source_file_header_skip_rows
Comment: when transformat, how many header lines need to be skpped

Name: source_file_footer_skip_rows
Comment: when transformat, how many footer lines need to be skipped

Name: source_file_has_column
Comment: if source file has column name

Name: source_file_columns
Comment: if source file doesn't have column name,
